TEXT.S: United kingdom hya' ga cyux maki' tay 54 00 N, 2 00 W na Oco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 243,610 sq km (maki' tay 80ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 241,930 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 1,680 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 64,430,428. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga71 , lhlahuy hya' ga 11.90 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 17.10 . spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga London. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Charles III.
